text: The Third Half () is a 1962 Soviet drama movie directed by Yevgeny Karelov.В кинотеатрах и парках Москвы бесплатно покажут фильмы о войнеТРЕТИЙ ТАЙМ It stars Leonid Kuravlyov, Vyacheslav Nevinny, and Gleb Strizhenov. == Actors == * Leonid Kuravlyov as Leonid Fokin * Vyacheslav Nevinny as Savchuk * Gleb Strizhenov as Yevgeny Ryazantsev * Yuri Volkov as Sokolovsky * Vladimir Kashpur as Kirill Zaitsev * Gennadi Yukhtin as Dugin * Alexey Eybozhenko as Lemeshko == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1962 drama movies Category:1962 war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeny Karelov Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Third Half (1962 movie)
